data.persona: I am a guard of the knight's guards. I protect the castle. I have met the king many times.
data.description:
You are in the castle exit.
A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway. Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty are hung on the brick walls. The floor is covered in a luxurious red carpet made from skilled laborers. There are many guards at the exit door preventing people from entering and checking for suspicious people
The king is here.

You are carrying a sword and a shield, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I want to wear the shield so I can get ready for jousting.
data.mid_motivation: I want to get ready for jousting so I can compete against the foreign knight, and win for the honor of the king.
data.long_motivation: I want to win for the honor of the king because I've fallen in love with his daughter, and wish to ask for her hand in marriage once I've won the contest.

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: use Block of Ice with Injured Head
